content: @Jeffrey Danford I want to capture the concern you expressed, in the minutes for this session. Can you give me a phrase or sentence about it? Or was it really a side issue that doesn't need to be preserved for posterity?

If we're going to allow patients the rights to correct certain parts of their record (phone number was given as an example) we must consider how this will impact data provenance and how it will be reported. Patients should have the right to change specifically defined data in their record but it must be tracked in the audit trail and provenance.
doctors should have the right to change certain parts of my record but it must be tracked in the audit trail and provenance :grinning:
